name: A Love Story (Sergei Zemtsev)
description:
Spring is always the time of love. What is hiding behind the colorful LED umbrella?

Is there maybe a tea party on the Moon, with a view of the Earth?

Or maybe heavy, long nights, hesitating to open The Box of Pain...

But we are all actors on stage, and everyone is equal before the rule "so-close-but-so-far"...

Spring, this is a love story.

- Fully playable English and Russian versions

- Completely original soundtrack and art 

- 4 endings, one of which is true
